scripts.build: npm run clean && prettier --write ./src/**/*.ts && npx tsc ./src/*.ts --outDir ./dist && mkdir -p ./dist/js && mkdir -p ./dist/css && mv ./dist/*.js ./dist/js/ && node ./dist/js/generateHTML.js && node ./dist/js/generateCSS.js && rm ./dist/js/generateHTML.js && rm ./dist/js/generateCSS.js
